properties.entry: SELECT T.TEAM_NAME, COUNT(M.MATCH_NO) AS MATCH_COUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN M.SCORE > O.SCORE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS WIN, SUM(CASE WHEN M.SCORE < O.SCORE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS LOSE FROM MATCH M JOIN TEAMS T ON M.TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO JOIN MATCH O ON M.MATCH_NO = O.MATCH_NO AND M.TEAM_NO != O.TEAM_NO GROUP BY T.TEAM_NAME ORDER BY WIN DESC
SELECT CATEGORY, PLAYER_NAME, TEAM_NAME, COUNT FROM PLAYER_RANKINGS
